mil3.3.5:0.3: Question on the Production and Development of Fabrications
mil3.3.5:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, are there any fabrications which are produced without development?”
mil3.3.5:1.3: “Your majesty, there are no fabrications which are produced without development. Fabrications are only produced with development.”
mil3.3.5:10.1: Question on the Production and Development of Fabrications fifth
